title: Fire
description: Hot stuff! Makes you feel warm! Mesmerizing, Burning, etc...

title: Water
description: Wetness, so Moist! Refreshing! Don't Drown!

title: Life
description: Growing things! So much abundance, Eat them, eat them!!!!

title: Earth
description: Clay and dirt! Earthworms, bacteria, silicates, so smelly!

title: Death
description: We are but dust, and sometimes butt dust. Too much of any other element results in this!

title: Air
description: Breathe! You can breathe can't you? You can? Yay!
